author: skews13
title: 9 Reasons Denmarks Socialist Economy Leaves US In The Dust
text: Posts: 4,850 9 Reasons Denmarks Socialist Economy Leaves US In The Dust Thanks to Vermont Senator Bernie SandersÂ’ proud identification as a Democratic Socialist and allusion to Denmark as an ideal social democracy, Denmark is being discussed throughout the news media. But what few outlets are brave enough to report is that, by almost every measurable standard, Danish socialism runs circles around American capitalism. Here are a few examples: Thanks from Fayt and Hollywood
